title: How to Make Caribbean Baked Beans

steps.headline: Rinse and drain the beans and drain the pineapple.
In your shallow casserole pan, mix everything but the whole green onions.
steps.description: If you are making it ahead of an event, you can store it up to 48 hours in the refrigerator.

steps.headline: Bake the beans in the oven, uncovered until it is bubbling in the center, about 25 minutes or so.

text: Preheat the oven to 375 °F (191 °C).  Rinse and drain the beans and drain the pineapple.  In your shallow casserole pan, mix everything but the whole green onions. If you are making it ahead of an event, you can store it up to 48 hours in the refrigerator. Bake the beans in the oven, uncovered until it is bubbling in the center, about 25 minutes or so. Stir occasionally while baking. Serve either hot or cold.
